```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(readxl)
debt <- read_excel("Makroøkonomisk projekt.xlsx", sheet = "Debt ")
na.omit(debt)
```

```{r}
date1 <- debt$Date...5
projectionbudget1 <- debt$`Percent of GDP...6`
date2 <- debt$Date...11
projection2 <- debt$`Percent of GDP...12`
plot(date1, projectionbudget1, type = "l", main = "Projection for net lending/borrowing", ylab = "Percent of GDP", xlab = "Årstal", col="red")
grid()
plot(date2, projection2, type = "l", main = "Projection of government gross debt for Germany ", ylab = "Percent of GDP", xlab = "Årstal", col="red")
grid()
```

Mac er det bedste lort i verden
